SELECT C.SECTION AS SECTION, COUNT(C.CAMPSITE_ID) AS REST_COUNT FROM CAMPSITE C WHERE C.CAMPSITE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT R.CAMPSITE_ID FROM RESERVE R WHERE TRUNC(R.START_DATE) < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(R.END_DATE) > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'PAID' )
GROUP BY C.SECTION ORDER BY C.SECTION

SELECT CAMPSITE_ID, SPOT_NO, PRICE, SECTION FROM CAMPSITE C WHERE C. CAMPSITE_ID NOT IN ( SELECT R.CAMPSITE_ID FROM RESERVE R WHERE TRUNC(R.START_DATE) < TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TRUNC(R.END_DATE) > TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AND PAYMENT_STATUS = 'PAID' ) AND C.SECTION = #{section} ORDER BY C.SPOT_NO ASC
